channel.title: DeltaScape Clean-up
channel.description:
Well, this is of course, another server I'm starting. However, instead of adding features, I'm removing them and cleaning DeltaScape out. Instead of using Notepad++, I'll be using Eclipse. For starts, I've removed the unused variables and shit that's useless, and done some minor performance tweaks (Such as only update a shop when needed).
The main goal of this is to remove all the unwanted shit, make it run faster, and look better (Which includes organization). I heard NewbieHacker is doing the same, but I haven't seen anything come from him, nor do I think I will.
Oh, and last but not least, I'm doing this out of boredom. Basically, I'll be using it as a time killer to slowly count my last summer days away until school :D (Does that even make sense?)
Anyway, there's no point in screenies, or more to talk about, so there it is.
~Lin
